title: Ranked
body: So while the bug thing happened i had done a ranked match before with 75lp I won that game and then got the bug where it made me reconnect to the ghost game and i never got the lp for that game? anyone else have that happen?

replies.body:
That recent game is most likely being affected by the ghost games we've been having recently. Normally they will clear out after enough time, but it sounds like this has been bothering you for quite a bit. Have you been able to get back into any games yet?

Also, once the game has been fully recorded the LP should show up!
I was able to do matches like an hour later but i did norms waiting for my lp to show up but it never did ? i stayed at that 75lp for that whole day.
